item.title: Passion Projects
item.description: Project Based Learning I believe that the best way to solidify programming concepts is by applying learned concepts in personal projects. These projects are a representation of the programming concepts I’ve learned and how I’ve applied and connected them together. Projects:

item.title: Programming Experience
